org.clapper.util.text

Class Unicode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.clapper.util.text.Unicode

  • public final class Unicode
extends java.lang.Object
    Symbolic names for certain Unicode constants. The constant names are adapted from the Unicode standard. See charts.unicode.org.

    • Field Summary

      • HAIR_SPACE

        public static final char HAIR_SPACE
        Hair space. Thinner than a THIN_SPACE, in traditional typography a hair space is the thinnest space available.
